title: Student Participation
description: Campus projects with a University department to enrich academic growth and development as well as academic growth and development of UCI. Includes 30 hours per quarter working on proposed project under faculty/staff supervision. Paper required.
prerequisite: Project must be approved by a Student Affairs Department head and the instructor.
repeatability: May be taken for credit 3 times.
